Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is only reported on a single website and cannot be found in any other news outlets.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Barack Obama sent a tweet on Valentine's Day stating that he and Michelle Obama were still happily married.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by including baseless and outlandish aspects, such as the assertion that a DNA test proved Barack Obama wasn't the biological father of Sasha and Malia.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the filing in the District Court of Cook County, Illinois is legitimate, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by including unreliable information and unsubstantiated claims.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is part of a network of junk news sites that publish political misinformation under the guise of satire.
